蟘字的基本解释

蟘
tè
吃禾苗叶子的害虫：“苗螟叶蟘，坐致销亡。”

蟘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tè］
［《集韻》敵德切，入德，定。］
亦作“螣2”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
吃苗叶的害虫。

蟘字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1096第36
【玉篇】徒得切，音特。食苗葉蟲。【爾雅·釋蟲】食葉蟘。　【唐韻】作?。【說文】引《詩》作蟘。本作螣。【六書正譌】俗作?，非。

蟘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蟘字的起名意思

暂无。

蟘
Basic explanation of words
蟘
tè
Pests that eat the leaves of grass seedlings: "The seedling borer, the leaf borer, sits and kills."
蟘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tè］
["Ji Yun" Enemy De Chi, enter De, Ding. ]
Also known as "螣2". Also known as "1". Also known as "1".
Pests that eat seedling leaves.

[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟘; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1096 Page 36
【Jade articles】It’s only a cut, Yinte. Feeding leaf insects. 【Erya·Release insects】Eating leaf worms.　[Tang Yun] for?. [Said Wen] Quoting "Poetry" as a 蟘. This is a fiddle. [Liu Shu Zhengzhen] popular writing?, non.
